}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Wireless standards: 802.11an (5GHz) *Frequency range: 4920-5920 MHz *Output power: 500mW (27dBm) *Connector: 2x MMCX *Level: 9x LED
==See also== *[[MikroTik R11e-2HnD]] • [https://mikrotik.com/product/R11e-2HnD PPage] *[[MikroTik R11e-2HPnD]] • [https://mikrotik.com/product/R11e-2HPnD PPage] *[[MikroTik R11e-5HacD]] • [https://mikrotik.com/product/R11e-5HacD PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7R11E5HACD TV7R11E5HACD] (07/09/2014), OUI: 4C:5E:0C :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9882 2T2R 802.11an/ac *[[MikroTik R11e-5HnD]] • [https://mikrotik.com/product/R11e-5HnD PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7R11E5HND TV7R11E5HND] (01/24/2014), OUI: 4C:5E:0C :[[Atheros]] AR9582 2T2R 802.11an ([http://lanmarket.ua/stats/obzor-besprovodnoy-miniPCI-e-karty-Mikrotik-R11e-5HnD review]) :See also RB14e, RB800, RB912 and RB921 series *[[MikroTik RB14e]] (4x Mini PCIe Adapter Card) • [https://mikrotik.com/product/RB14e PPage]
